mtsQuery: sf_metric:CPU Percentage OR sf_metric:dtu_consumption_percent OR sf_metric:cachehits

job.template:
DTU_PERCENTAGE = data("dtu_consumption_percent", filter=filter("resource_type", "Microsoft.Sql/servers/databases"){{#filter}} and {{{filter}}}{{/filter}}, extrapolation="last_value", maxExtrapolations=5).mean(by=["azure_resource_name"])
VM_CPU = data("Percentage CPU", filter=filter("resource_type", "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines"){{#filter}} and {{{filter}}}{{/filter}}, extrapolation="last_value", maxExtrapolations=5).mean(by=["azure_resource_name"])
CACHE_HITS = data("cachehits", filter=filter("resource_type", "Microsoft.Cache/Redis"){{#filter}} and {{{filter}}}{{/filter}}, rollup="average", extrapolation="last_value", maxExtrapolations=5).mean(by=["azure_resource_name"])
CACHE_MISSES = data("cachemisses", filter=filter("resource_type", "Microsoft.Cache/Redis"){{#filter}} and {{{filter}}}{{/filter}}, rollup="average", extrapolation="last_value", maxExtrapolations=5).mean(by=["azure_resource_name"])
CACHE_HIT_PERCENT=((CACHE_HITS) / ((CACHE_HITS) + CACHE_MISSES) * 100)
INGRESS_TRAFFIC = data("Ingress", filter=filter("resource_type", "Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts"){{#filter}} and {{{filter}}}{{/filter}}, extrapolation="last_value", maxExtrapolations=2).sum(by=["azure_resource_name"])
